name: Psychdive.
summary: A psycho-analytical dive into one e-spectre's dreams

name: Psychic World
summary:
Maddening...

Your sister has been abducted by mutants. But where have they taken her? And why?
Travel through four fantastic worlds of fire and ice to find her. Call on your basic psychic powers to overcome dangerous monsters and deadly machines.

Along the way, you’ll pick up ESP skills. Use them to wrench your sister from the clutches of the evil mutants. And use them
well. Your life - and your sister’s depend on it!

Can the powers of ESP overcome the powers of Evil?

name: Psi Cards
summary: Casual card game. Its purpose is to test your psychic abilities or just to make it spend your time. To play the game you need to guess the cards. With each level, the number of cards and the complexity, increases.

name: Psychomachia
summary: Psychomachia is an explosive local/couch multiplayer fighting game with an extreme focus on custom character creation.

name: PsycoCat
summary: You are the PsycoCat, an ultimate cat hooked to a balloon with an alien weapon After an apprenticeship against floating rocks you will be ready to fight the most terrible creatures of the world. Bull, rabbit, flying chicken and more await you for a terrible confrontation in the heavens.

name: Psyvariar Delta
summary: Psyvariar Delta is a classic shooter known for the Buzz System, where players level up by grazing enemy fire and chaining Buzz. Also included in this version are 2 HD remakes of the arcade classic Psyvariar Medium Unit and Psyvariar Revision with new additional features.

name: Psychedelica of the Black Butterfly
summary:
Awakening in a mysterious mansion, her first, frantic thoughts are: "Where am I? And more importantly Who am I?"

She encounters several young men in the same predicament trapped and missing their memories. To survive they must hunt black butterflies and claim kaleidoscope shards from the horrific monsters surrounding them.

Will their path lead them to hope or despair?

Follow the black butterflies as your choices unlock numerous story paths, a mansion full of fascinating characters, and a multitude of surprising endings. A mini game lets players unlock additional plot elements. Set in a highly unique, surreal atmosphere with contrasts of bright, psychedelic colors and dark, muted tones, Psychedelica of the Black Butterfly is an unforgettable adventure.

name: Psych
summary: Play as Psych, while he escapes from a research facility run by evil slugs as they attempt to harvest him for his psychic powers. Face the evil slugs and survive the lab! Watch_out_for_Failed_Experiment

name: Psycho Pigs
summary: Who said pigs are peaceful? In Psyco Pig, forget mud and food—it’s all about bombs! Throw explosives, set traps, and cause farmyard mayhem. Play solo or challenge friends in wild local multiplayer battles. Explosions everywhere! Get ready to oink with chaos!

name: Psycho-unstable Journey
summary: This game is about traveling by car. Here you have to overcome a long way through rain and lightning.

name: Psycholytic
summary: Reality and illusion are a thought apart. Switch worlds, solve puzzles, and reshape your perception in the first-person puzzle game Psycholytic.

name: Psycron
summary: Psycron is a 2D action Metroidvania where you try and escape the deep space scientific research vessel Ceremos. Explore four wildly different areas as you fight strange enemies, acquire upgrades which change how you traverse the station and discover what happened to the crew of the Ceremos as you try to escape.

name: Psibo
summary: Psibo is a game that mashes together mechanics of many timeless arcade classics in a new, sleek form. Fight your way through the hexagonal defense systems of the universe in the original levels, or try to get the highest score in the endless mode!

name: Psytraxx
summary: A action-adventure written by Andrew Beale featuring a playing area of more than 1000 screens.

name: Psi 5 Trading Company
summary: PSI-5 Trading Company is a space simulation/action game. Players command an interstellar trading ship, hiring a specialized crew to operate the ship's subsystems and hauling valuable cargo to its destination amid a galaxy full of pirates, hostile aliens, and other hazards.

name: Psychic Detective Vol. 2: Memories
summary: The 2nd entry in Data West's FM Town adventure series.

name: Psychosis
summary: Fight against demons and your own mind to save yourself from a never-ending hell in this retro-style survival-horror game about mystery, psychology, and the coldness of killing. Banish demons with deadly weapons and reassemble the mysterious pieces of a family gone missing in Psychosis.

name: Psikyo Shooting Collection Vol. 2: Sengoku Ace + Sengoku Blade
summary: A two game compilation that was released as part of the Psikyo Shooting Collection in Japan.

name: Psycho Strafe
summary: Procedurally generated, arcade action FPS with emphasis on strafing like a psycho. No instant hit-scan weapons, all projectiles have trajectory...

name: PSS-63
summary: A compilation cartridge compatible only with the Super Famicom Box.

name: Psi Masquerade Deadly Wonderland
summary: Online PvP action and roguelike multiplayer combat. Battle with random abilities in PSI Masquerade, bring gear and allies into Transrealm Masquerade, or explore the roguelike Deadly Wonderland, playable both online and offline.

name: PSS-64
summary: A compilation cartridge compatible only with the Super Famicom Box.

name: Psycho-Pass: Mandatory Happiness
summary: In a world where psychological states can be quantified, every choice has consequences, victims can become criminals, and the very nature of truth can warp and shift. Can detectives Nadeshiko Kugatachi and Takuma Tsurugi remain on the path of justice as they face the ugly truths of humanity?

name: Psychopomp 2
summary: The beautiful world of Psychopomp returns. Ascend into a brand new nightmare. A Dog told you the world will end in three days. Travel across strange landscapes, discover bizarre secrets, and meet unthinkable creatures. Something gnaws at your memory. Will you remember before it is too late?

name: Psychic Force EX
summary: Psychic Force EX is an enhanced revision of the original Psychic Force. It introduces gameplay improvements, including balance adjustments and new mechanics, and makes the previously hidden character Keith Evans playable from the start. The game serves as a bridge to its sequel, Psychic Force 2012.

name: Psychopomp Gold
summary: Psychopomp is BACK. The catacombs stretch down farther than ever before. Your entire life has been a lie. Delve into the depths, and discover the horrors that lie below. More realms, more modes, more secrets. An ancient voice calls to you from the center of the earth. Will you answer it?

name: Psycho Chaser
summary: Psycho Chaser is a vertically-scrolling sci-fi shooter. The player takes control of the titular battle android. There are multiple weapons which can be picked up and freely switched between, and also power-ups which allow for weapon and energy upgrades between stages.

name: Pseudomod
summary: Adventure through sewers, creepy houses, forests, caves, mines, underground rivers, dockyard, deserts, boats, prisons, space robots. Drive and race hovercrafts and your desert buggy down the sewers and dangerous desert track. Pseudomod will give you multiple hours of quality singleplayer gameplay and enjoyment.

name: Psycho Squirrels
summary: Psycho Squirrels is a 2D platforming, puzzle game where players must navigate squirrels through a variety of stages to collect acorns before winter arrives. These city squirrels have been slacking off and aren't prepared for winter. They need your help as they head out into the world in search of acorns. Get ready to get nuts!​- Help the squirrels collect enough acorns before winter arrives. - Use the local flora and fauna to guide your squirrels to their goals. - Navigate through 50 puzzling stages plus bonus stages.

name: Pseudoku
summary: Sudokuesque puzzle game with variety of rules and chill ambient soundtrack.

name: Psycho Boys
summary: Casual single or local co-op game (1-4 players). Throw bombs at enemies and try survive yourself or with your friend.

name: Psychroma
summary: Psychroma is a narrative-driven side-scroller where you play as a digital medium. Confront the past by piecing together the broken memories of a cybernetic house, and exorcise the ghosts in the machine.

name: Psycho
summary: You’re trapped in an endless nightmare, reliving the same haunted night over and over. Every time you escape your house, reality resets. Haunted by grief and stalked by a relentless presence, can you solve the twisted puzzles and face the truth to break the loop?

name: Psychopath Hunt
summary: Psychopath hunt - penetrate the house of the insane maniac to find and rescue a girl kidnapped by the villain. Be apprehensive for your life! Demonstrate courage and inventiveness in this Android game. A horrible psychopath kidnapped a girl and locked her in his house. You must rescue a poor victim before the maniac kills her. For this you must penetrate a scary house of the villain. Carefully examine the rooms, basement and other premises. Find evidence and clues. Get useful objects. However, you need to remember that the maniac can hear your steps.

name: Psychic Eclipse Code: Green
summary: A sequel to the first Psychic Eclipse game.

name: PsyShift
summary: PsyShift is a renewed take on a beloved classic. PsyShift will provide a fun experience for all and an enjoyable play-style that will keep you coming back for more. Use every mechanic to your advantage! Enjoy the varying music styles as you get lost in PsyShift, the renewed rendition of a classic.

name: Psyvariar 3
summary: Play as one of 7 pilots in this thrilling sequel to a SHMUP classic. The time has come for a new generation of Psyvariars to rise… and save humanity.

name: Psychiatric Prison Romance: Serial Killer Anime Girls Dating Sim
summary:
12 girls, 30 days, one prison… and every decision could be your last.
Deep within an isolated prison, twelve girls await you. They are beautiful, intense… and dangerously unpredictable. Each one has a hidden story, an obsession, a secret that might make you crave their love… or fear for your life.

name: Psyvariar: Complete Edition
summary: Psyvariar: Complete Edition is a Space Shooter game, developed by Skonec and published by Success, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Psikyo Shooting Stars Alpha
summary: STRIKERS 1945, STRIKERS 1945 II, STRIKERS 1945 III, SOL DIVIDE, Dragon Blaze, and ZERO GUNNER 2 combine forces in one arcade collection! Bring the arcade home by blasting through these shooters vertically in the popular ‘TATE’ mode for the ultimate shoot-em-up experience!

name: Psikyo Shooting Stars Bravo
summary: Samurai Aces Episode I, Samurai Aces Episode II: TENGAI, Samurai Aces Episode III: SENGOKU CANNON, GUNBARICH, GUNBIRD, and GUNBIRD2 unite to form this epic arcade collection! Bring the arcade home by blasting through these shooters vertically in the popular ‘TATE’ mode for the ultimate shoot-em-up experience!

name: Psychological Challenge
summary: An unsettling little game that can increase blood pressure and effectively treat low blood pressure.

name: Psychic Detective
summary: This game is an innovative slant on the interactive movie. You're Eric Fox, a psychic detective who can transmit his psychic self to others, to see through their eyes and hear through their ears. That way you can find out things about the case you couldn't otherwise. The game has many different conclusions. It's a dark story though, and most people might not want to play through again.

name: Psycasso
summary:
Take on the role of a serial killer who creates paintings with their victims blood! Sell your creations to earn money while trying to avoid capture by the police and other civilians.

In this pixel art adventure you'll play as Psycasso, a struggling gallery artist living in an open world city. By day you'll work a day job to earn money and level up skills, seamlessly blending into society. By night you'll be on the lookout to harvest 'red paint' from one of the 'walking meat-bags' to help you create original 2D art. Sell your artwork to art galleries for huge profits! Become rich from your unique artwork while avoiding capture from the ever growing police presence using stealth techniques and unique traps. Buy property, upgrades, furniture, weapons, discover a bustling city and play a host of mini games in this controversial indie title like nothing before.

name: PsychexFuse
summary: A lovingly hand-drawn adventure into esoteric worlds filled with threats, puzzles and horror. Help, save and clash with past versions of yourself, and unravel the mystery behind two and a half gods at war.

name: Psycho Waluigi
summary: Psycho Waluigi is a platformer fangame featuring Waluigi and his newly discovered psychic powers in the world of Unconcia. The protagonist must endure through over 30 kingdoms using the mechanics related to its psycho powers.

name: Psionic Awake
summary: Psionic Awake is a Roguelike game . Collect resources during the day and defend against monsters at night. It emphasizes any combination of weapons, talents, treasures and partners.

name: Psycutlery
summary:
It's a spoon. And yet, it's also a fork. Or is it either? It's a video game-type thing currently in development here at Eyes in Everything, by Luke Tarlowe.

Take control of Lillian the Alien and her mind-controlled spork. Bring down an incomprehensible abomination of evil with a single piece of silverware, and witness copious craziness unfold across the planet!

name: Psycholonials
summary: While in communication with supernatural forces, two influencers launch a daring new social media brand. After getting in trouble with the law, they must consider how to navigate stardom as scrutiny of their project intensifies. The visual novel begins on April 20th, 2020, taking place on an island off the coast of New England.

name: Psi Project 2
summary: Project 9 is a game of endless war. The player can utilize first person, third person and RTS controls to progress. Using several open environments and their resources to build your army, base and weapons needed survive against the opposing force. Project 9 is set to release on steam under early access Q1 2017.

name: Psycho Bathroom
summary:
Psycho Bathroom is a 2D boss rush game. In the bathroom you reside in, your toilet lid is broken. Every toilet flush is splashing aerosols all over the place. You, as a toothbrush, must eradicate the threat and protect your master.
Upgrade your gear! Meet new buddies! Bond with your master and explore his dark but comic story.

name: Psychic Ward: Kill The Seven King Dragon
summary: Join the world as an agent of the Psychic Ward. Explore the strange surreal world and capture the immense world restructuring power of the Seven King Dragon.

name: Psychofinger
summary: Survive hordes of ghosts in this FPS-roguelite. Become an agent at the Department of Metaphysical Investigations and unveil the mystery of an old church. Choose Aberrant Items that will upgrade your character, fight bosses and unlock new hand gestures.

name: Psycho Fear
summary: Psycho Fear is a heart-pounding co-op survival-horror experience where players must escape to survive. Solve challenging puzzles, overcome deadly obstacles, and fight deadly enemies in an intense atmosphere, nerve-wracking and dark environment will keep players on edge.

name: Psy-O-Blade
summary: In 21th century, there are three main powers on the Earth. The free world and the communist block carried over from the 20th century; the third power is the New Communist Federation. Since a program of denuclearizing was supported by all those powers, the New Communist Federation developed a devastating non-nuclear weapon: the satellite "Raiden". The two other powers competed with the New Communist Federation, developing their own killer satellites, and the danger of total annihilation became once again an issue. Seeing no future for the Earth, humans started to colonize other planets. In 22th century, they sent an experimental ship "Septemius 1" to a star six light years far away from the Solar System. The ship's main computer, "Racoon", sent a strange message before stopping any communication. Keith McDonnell, a seventeen-year-old crew member of the ship "Septemius 2", was sent to investigate the strange disappearance. Psy-O-Blade is a Japanese adventure in anime style. The player interacts with the game world by moving a cursor and clicking on objects to examine or use them, and people to talk to them, or by choosing options ("Move" and "Scroll") from a menu. There are no puzzles to solve; the player advances in the game by talking to characters, visiting different locations, as well as examining and using objects.

name: Psychic Shadows
summary: Unpleasant dreams await you in Psychic Shadows, an independent video game made in RPG Maker VX Ace where every decision matters.

name: PsiFrost
summary: Long ago, humanity withdrew from the earth’s scarred surface and lives in great floating colonies in the clouds. Cut off from the others centuries ago, the inhabitants of the colony VIMANA have no way of knowing how many survive, and their origins have become the stuff of legend...but legends also speak of an escape. With society breaking apart into petty fiefdoms ruled by harsh warlords and the colony’s systems slowly failing, some say a path appears to those who seek it, a great road through the sky leading the brave down to the surface where life now once again blooms.

name: PsyOps Solutions
summary: This JRPG was made for true JRPG fans. As an employee of PsyOps Solutions, you will need to complete the Contract given to you: Kill General Swanson. You are going to need to explore, fight, and help people out to become strong enough to complete your mission.

name: Psycho Wolf
summary:
Psycho wolf is an indie stealth game, which draws inspiration for its unique graphic style from the first 3D games of mid 90's. 
Gameplay itself is the evolution of the best mechanics encountered in modern games.

name: Psychonauts in the Rhombus of Ruin
summary: Psychonauts in the Rhombus of Ruin is a first-person virtual reality puzzle platform video game. The game's story is intended to bridge the events between Psychonauts and Psychonauts 2.

name: Psycho Fox
summary: Psycho Fox must get to the right hand side of the level. However, there are many enemies in the way. He can use a Shinto stick to change into characters/animals like a hippopotamus, a monkey or a tiger, each of which has its own special ability. The hippopotamus is slow and cannot jump very high, but can punch through special destructible blocks in the game world. The monkey can jump higher than the other creatures and the tiger can run faster. Psycho also has an ally named Birdfly, who can be used as armor or as a boomerang. If Psycho is hit while carrying Birdfly, Birdfly goes away and the player does not lose a life.

name: Psyche60s
summary: Immerse yourself in Psyche60s, an innovative experience that takes you back to San Francisco in the 1960s. Created by renowned photographer Roberto Rabanne, Psyche60s features unique artwork, original music, and rich historical insights. Experience a paradigm-shifting cultural "Youthquake"!

name: Psychosoft Ltd.
summary: The dog who was betrayed by a friend and led to the bankruptcy of the company was entrusted by his uncle to manage another company. Who knows that it was a mental hospital in arrears of huge rent!!! The dog who had nowhere to live was forced to take over the hospital.

name: Psychedelic Dream
summary: A surreal dream exploration game inspired by LSD: Dream Emulator and Yume Nikki. Enter doors to load randomized dream worlds based on real dreams — from peaceful to nightmarish. Explore, solve puzzles, and submit your own dreams to be added in future updates!

name: Psyolence
summary: Psyolence is an arcade hardcore top-down slasher with neon graphics.

name: Psychic Emotion 6
summary: Psychic Emotion 6 is both a drama CD title by Otomate Records and a game developed by Otomate. The game released on October 6th, 2016.

name: Psychic Eclipse: Reload
summary:
First released for PC in November 2021, Psychic Eclipse centers on the main character, Kay Yorshka, who lives in a shelter for people with supernatural abilities known as the Dome. This Nintendo Switch port brings new voices and stills to the game.
The main scenario is written by ICHIHA, the writer of Nakigara no Tori and Beast x Light. Reo Uratani, who has created music for the Monster Hunter series, provided the opening song and Ichihara composed the game’s BGM.

name: Psycho-Kin
summary: Psycho-Kin is a top-down shooter in which you control two characters. Strategically navigate through levels, deciphering the order to eliminate targets. Unravel the mysteries of a retired soldier's past, endowed with a unique psychic ability.

name: PSoul
summary: Step into the thrilling world of PSoul, the ultimate Pokémon-themed MMORPG, where adventure awaits at every corner. Become a Pokémon trainer and explore a vast open world teeming with over 700 iconic and unique Pokémon. Embark on epic quests, discover hidden treasures, challenge powerful trainers, and compete in heart-pounding tournaments. Whether you're battling to be the best or forging friendships in a vibrant community, PSoul offers endless excitement and challenges for all Pokémon enthusiasts. Your legendary journey starts here!

name: Psychic Storm
summary: Psychic Storm is a vertically scrolling shoot-em-up in which the player takes the role of four characters who must protect Neo Hong Kong City from an assault by vicious insectoid aliens.

name: Psalm VR
summary: “Psalm VR” is a psychological horror in VR where you find yourself in an eerie world seen through the lens of an old camera. The darkness hides something unseen..... Look around, listen... it's already watching you. Will you dare to look into the shadows?

name: Psikodelya
summary: Explore multiple dimensions in a psychedelic world in the quest to find Alice project files. Solve puzzles and overcome obstacles on gravity-defying platforms. Welcome to the world of Psikodelya!

name: Psychonauts 2
summary:
Psychonauts 2 is a platform-adventure game developed by Double Fine Productions and released in 2021. It continues the story of Razputin “Raz” Aquato, a young psychic who joins the international psychic espionage agency known as the Psychonauts.
Gameplay combines platforming, exploration, and combat with psychic abilities such as telekinesis, pyrokinesis, and mental connection. Players journey through imaginative levels set inside characters’ minds, each reflecting their personalities and struggles.

name: Psychopathy Assessment
summary: Psychopathy Assessment is a retro-80s V.H.S PS1 style analog horror game that blurs the line between reality and delusion. Step into a universe where you're not just playing a game; you're taking a psychopathy test, but the stakes are considerably higher than a straightforward diagnosis.

name: Psichodelya
summary: Psichodelya pays homage to old-school style top-down shmups (shoot-em-up’s) such as DoDonPachi, Ikaruga, Espgaluda, R-Type Delta, Aero Fighters, Giga Wing, Raiden, and more recent Jamestown. Players control one of 3 playable ships - dodging bullets and destroying wave after wave of enemies for points in either single or 2 player local coop modes. There are 5 manic levels, each with an epic boss and 5 difficulty levels.

name: Psikyo Shooting Collection Vol. 3: Sol Divide & Dragon Blaze
summary: A Japanese compilation of a top-down bullet hell shooter and an adventure game.

name: Psych//Shift
summary: Psych//Shift is a unique take on the fast and frenetic First-Person Shooter/Parkour formula. With one core mechanic at its center, the ability to instantaneously swap minds with nearly any enemy you choose. Taking on both their current position and also their characteristics.

name: Psi
summary: Psi is a magical tech spell programming mod inspired by the light novel The Irregular at Magic High School.

name: Psikyo: Shooting Library Vol. 2
summary:
Psikyo Shooting Library Vol. 2, is squeezing six titles into one juicy bundle! Including;
- Sengoku Ace
- Sengoku Blade
- Sengoku Cannon
- Gunbird
- Gunbird 2
- Gunbarich

name: Psychic Force 2012
summary:
Psychic Force 2012, the sequel to Psychic Force, is a one-on-one fighting game with a twist. The matches take place inside a giant floating cube. You are able to fly, using your psychic abilities, around a 3D arena with six walls. Each of the ten available characters, Might, Regina, Wendy, Emilio, Setsuna, Patty, Gudeath, Genshin, Carlo, and Gates, are controlled with three buttons: guard, weak attack and strong attack. The effect varies with the distance. Next to the regular life meter, there is also a power meter. By using special moves, the meter is drained and your moves are limited. It is possible to recharge, and the capacity of the power meter expands when you lose a lot of health.

Additionally, each fighter has its own unique moves, energy attacks and a weapon, which they use, mid-flight, to pummel their opponent. There are three main game modes: training, versus and a story mode using static anime-inspired images and in-engine cut scenes to tell the story. The story centers around two groups of psychics with differing ideals about co-existence with humans. In the middle of this are several neutral psychics with ties to members in either group.

name: Psycho on the loose
summary:
An assassin with a rise in his career to kill his target is out on a murdering spree. He is out there with alot of motives but his main motive is two eliminate all targets and who ever may get in his way. He is stealthy with his moves and he always watches his back, he changes outfits to suit his missions and has a van with a variety of weapons to choose from, they range from your smaller weapons to the larger weapons, even throwables such as, grenades and molotoves. If he is not careful and is to roucous then he has more then just his target to deal with when backup arrives. His missions take him from woodlands to suburb and cities, no matter if its day or night.

You are him so make sure you are stealthy, move corpse to not alert those around. Earn money from each person killed, pass the level and you get to keep your earnings, die and loose all money earned. With a variety of maps and missions, it shall take you into places day or night. Be prepared and select weapons to help you. Good luck Cane!

name: Psi Academy: Orientation
summary: Finding love in a psychic high school.

name: Psychiatric Prison Romance: Serial Killer Anime Boys Dating Sim
summary: 12 boys, 30 days, one prison… and every decision could be your last.

name: Psycho-Sleuth
summary: Psycho-Sleuth is a psychological mystery where cognitive disorders twist the logic of murder. 13 afflicted participants — each bound by strange rules like “no lying,” “no left side,” or “no faces” — are trapped in a deadly game where the sickness spreads and truth itself becomes unreliable.

name: Psycho Partisans: Officer Nirvana
summary: Dive into Psycho Partisan, the gripping episodic adventure horror series! Survive the brutal grip of an East European dictatorship, blending eerie Slavic mythology with true tales of Belarusian heroes battling for freedom. Each episode unleashes heart-pounding terror and resilience.

name: Psychic Force
summary:
The plot of Psychic Force takes place in the year 2010, where selected individuals are blessed with the power of psychic abilities. All people imbued with this power are called "Psychiccers" and uses a specific element such as fire, light, wind, electricity, gravity, time, or ice in fighting.

Psychiccers are shunned by normal people in general because of their unnatural abilities and that most cases turn violent and deadly from within sight. All of that changes one day when a mysterious Psychiccer organization known as NOA appears and offers Psychiccers a place from within their company. Headed by a young British Psychiccer man named Keith Evans, NOA seeks to create a perfect utopia for Psychiccers and that they'll eliminate anyone who tries to stand in their way.

Challenging NOA's ambition is a small independent group known as Anti-NOA and that one of its members, a young American Psychiccer man named Burn Griffiths, seeks to confront and stop his old friend Keith from going through with his extreme plans of creating a Psychiccer-only world.

name: Psycho Patrol R
summary:
Psycho Patrol R is a mecha FPS hybrid policing and punishment simulator set in the decayed state of Pan-Europa. You play as an officer of the European Federal Police, a V-Stalker pilot of Psycho Patrol, a special unit tasked with solving mental crime, among other things.

The gameplay is a combination of high intensity tactical FPS combat, combined seamlessly with operating your V-Stalker mecha unit to decimate your enemies. The world is open with a variety of different goals to achieve.

Wide variety of weapons, from small arms to 120mm cannons.
Customize your V-Stalker for a massive tactical advantage.
Choose from a wide variety of routes and approaches.
Open, non-linear world.
Unique NPCs to meet and interact with.
Solve the mystery of the Orgone.

name: Psychosis: Teaser
summary:
Psychosis is a first-person psychological survival-horror game about familicide, presented in a retro, derezzed art style.

When a family goes missing and you receive a mysterious phone call, all hell breaks loose as you are plunged into an expansive world where demons hunt you down and logic is turned inside out. Battle with the shreds of your own humanity through an hour of mind-breaking gameplay packed with combat, puzzles and mystery.

name: PseudoSanity
summary: Fight multiple monsters at once while uncovering the mysteries of your missing father. Solve puzzles and find more weapons, but most importantly, try not to fall insane.

name: Psychoscopy
summary: Psychoscopy is a 5 player co-op horror game that you try to gather evidences about paranormal activities in large areas. Make a team with your 4 friends, take your equipments and hunt down paranormal activities.

name: Psycho Dream
summary: Sayaka Kaori has fallen into a coma. However, she can be reached by a machine that can people into dreams. Dreams are incredibly surreal places, and are often very dangerous. Only experts from The National Public Safety Commission, also known as Diamond Dogs, are authorized to enter. It's up to Ryo and Maria, two of the best Diamond Dog officers, to save Sayaka and wake her from her coma.

name: Psycho Crab
summary:
A 2D physics platformer with an unusual control scheme, Psycho Crab is a game where you will fall down. A lot. Possibly into lava. While maybe being chased by seagulls.
Play as a crab on a journey to eat a brick of sushi, climbing over (and under, and around) whatever stands in your way.

name: Psi-Ops: The Mindgate Conspiracy
summary:
Psi-Ops is an action game with a twist: no longer do you have to rely solely on big weapons and explosions to progress through it - you also have the aid of psychic powers to take down army after army of enemy soldiers.

In the game you take the role of Nick Scryer, a secret agent who had his face reconstructed and mind wiped clean in order to infiltrate a growing psychic organization calling itself The Movement. Nick, however, is captured, but manages to free himself and continue his mission to stop The Movement, regaining his psychic abilities along the way.

The game mixes regular weapons with the weapons of the mind. You'll have access to a series of mind powers, such as Telekinesis (the ability to fling object and soldiers around), Pyrokineses (the ability to set things on fire), Mind Drain (for draining Psi power out of foes' minds) and Remote Viewing (leaving your body behind and exploring the level).

name: Psychiatrist Simulator 2
summary: Take role as Dr. Smith, psychotherapist. Game consists of real people video recordings. Talk with them, treat, learn about psychology. Your choices have consequences, at the end you will see what happened in their life after meeting with you.

name: Psalm 5:9-13
summary: "Psalm 5:9-13" is a first-person psychological horror game with VHS effect. Be careful and attentive, there is something hiding in these rooms, something is watching from the darkness.

name: Psych: The Game
summary:
In Psych, you play as the brilliant Shawn Spencer, a private detective with a knack for solving crimes. Thanks to his unique abilities, the local police department hires him as their psychic advisor. Your mission is to help Shawn and his team solve a deadly case in Santa Barbara, California, using your keen observation and puzzle-solving skills. The unparalleled storyline and engaging gameplay make it the perfect choice for fans of the television show and hidden object games.
You will explore over 40 locations in sunny Santa Barbara while completing dozens of mini-games and puzzles. Along the way, you will interact with all your favorite characters from the hit show, including Gus and Lassiter, as you unravel mysteries and enjoy hilarious dialogue. Experience the thrill of solving a case as a private detective, all while immersing yourself in the beloved and humorous world of Psych.

name: Psychonauts
summary: Psychonauts is a platform-adventure game developed by Double Fine Productions and released in 2005. It follows Razputin “Raz” Aquato, a young psychic who runs away from the circus to attend a summer camp for aspiring psychonauts. Players explore imaginative levels set inside the minds of different characters, each reflecting their mental states. Gameplay combines platforming, combat, and the use of psychic abilities such as telekinesis and levitation. The game was praised for its creativity, humor, and distinctive art style.

name: Psychiatrist Simulator
summary: Have you ever wanted to be a psychiatrist? Now you can! Be a shrink for 14 days. Meet 14 patients with unique story of their lives. Diagnosis, treatment, chosen dialogues have impact on history of patients. The choice is yours.

name: Psychopomp
summary:
Welcome to the world of Psychopomp.
There are catacombs hidden under every building in the world.
Everyone knew about them, but lied to you about them your entire life.

Descend into the depths, and see what awaits below.

Psychopomp is a short Psychological Horror Dungeon Crawler.
Something is wrong with the world, everything is not as you remember.
You don't know why, but everything draws you to the Earth, to the tunnels below. Do the answers await you there, or is something far worse in store?

name: PsychWorld
summary: Export a vast procedurally generated world where you never know what you'll see next. Explore and loot a variety of structures such as the catacombs and turret towers. Slaughter enemies, grow your defenses, and escape the prison that is your mind. Just make sure you're not followed...

name: Psychedelica of the Ashen Hawk
summary: Uncover the secret – Unite the clans In a town ruled by opposing clans and overshadowed by superstition and legend, a child is born with the dreaded mark of a witch. She conceals her identity until the theft of a mysterious relic brings to light a series of staggering revelations. The mysteries she will uncover could restore order...

name: Psychopomp
summary: Play as Hermes, the Psychopomp, tasked with collecting letters left around the ruins and delivering them to trains running across the vast ocean. Fly, glide, and explore forgotten ruins.

name: PSBO
summary: PSBO is an online snowboard racing game that pits players around the world in competitive matches on the universe’s most dangerous slopes. It features over twenty different maps and three different game modes - Race, Battle, or Coin.

name: PsyQik
summary: PsyQik is a fast-paced psychedelic action game, featuring vibrant neon visuals and innovative interactive effects. Immerse yourself in an otherworldly adventure as you uncover the ultimate truth in a mesmerizing world that captivates your eyes and mind.

name: PsychoCudgel
summary: Umm… Just a 3D precision platformer game about Journey to The West. Might be a bit difficult.

name: PSI Masquerade
summary: PSI Masquerade, an online action fighting death game for both PC and smartphone.

name: Psycho Santa
summary: Freebie game included on a demo disk in the January 1993 issue of "The One" Amiga magazine.

name: Psycho Shopper
summary: You have to dodge other shoppers and vehicles while being on a shopping spree.

name: Psychose
summary: Try the new experience Psychose horror game. Sneak around to complete puzzles without getting caught, paid attention to the noises, to the lights.

name: Psychoverse City
summary: PSYCHOVERSE CITY, a dizzyingly fast-paced first-person platformer across the rooftops of an ever-evolving cityscape, accompanied by adrenaline-pumping beats!

name: Psi-Warrior
summary: You search an abandoned military facility for an unknown power.

name: Psyche Metal: The Bleeding
summary: A 2004 freeware bullet hell game with a body horror "meat level" aesthetic.

name: Psych
summary: Pretending to be a psychic is as fun as it looks! Based on the Hit USA TV show, Shawn Spencer is a private detective who has an almost supernatural gift for crime-solving – so much so that the local police department hires him as their Psychic Advisor! Shawn quickly finds that his gifts, although formidable, don’t exactly keep him out of trouble. Help Shawn and his best friend Gus find clues, solve puzzles, and unravel mysteries in this humorous Hidden Object adventure game!

name: Psyvariar Reassemble
summary:
"Psyvariar", the popular game with its BUZZ system released in 2000,
now returns again over 16 years as versus shooting game!

Enjoy the top Manic shooting game with the easy operation.

name: Psychosomnium
summary: Psychosomnium is an experiment in illogical puzzles or dream world logic. You'll play the game trying to figure out how to reach an obscure goal. You'll have to do many strange things to reach this goal, like going in directions you wouldn't expect to be able or even putting yourself in unreasonable, and perhaps deadly, peril.

name: PSI Magic
summary: PSI Magic is a classic RPG made for simple fun. Join in on an RPG experience in which enemies can even 'level up' along with you or enjoy exploration in a vast game world!

name: Psycho World
summary: Psycho World is the scariest horror game ever, set in a haunted asylum where you must solve puzzles and avoid being killed by deranged spirits. Beware: they'll stop at nothing to ensure you never leave alive.

name: Psychotic Adventures Origins
summary:
Tackle controversial topics through the eyes of a child in these satirical adventures that will lure you to the dark corners of everyday life. 
 
Create your own religion piece by piece or craft your way to world domination in this uniquely colorful and hand-crafted world. Meet the peculiar characters of the Psychotic Adventures and uncover their stories that unfold as you progress during your quest. 
 
Psychotic Adventures Origins is a compilation of the first two games set in the Psychotic universe: Agatha Knife and MechaNika by the Spain-based developer Mango Protocol. These two games laid the groundwork for the weird and colorful setting of this series.

name: PSS-62
summary: A compilation cartridge compatible only with the Super Famicom Box.

name: Psycho Starship Rampage
summary: You play the psychotic A.I. of a warship lost in space which tries to come back to Earth. Build your spaceship from scratch. Load it with weapons. And use your creation to destroy waves of innocent aliens throughout numerous levels. Loot their carcasses, extend your ship and jump to the next sector for more action!

name: Psychon
summary: Net Yaroze top-down shooter.

name: Psyworld
summary: Jump 'n run

name: Pssst
summary: Growing the best Thyrgodian Megga Chrisanthodil possible is the sole purpose of Robbie the Robot. When insects invade his garden, he has to stop them ruining his work. He has a canister of insect repellent, a smoke-bomb and a startling streamer, each placed on walls at the side of his garden. Each will stun any particular vermin, but you will need to find out exactly what kills what.

name: Psyke
summary: Psyke is a psychedelic rhythm FPS roguelite about using psychic powers to make your escape! Explore the shifting laboratory and survive the physics based bullet hell onslaught.

name: Psychic Detective Vol. 3: Aya
summary: The 3rd entry in the Psychic Detective franchise and the first title to be released on a console.

name: Psycho Harrier
summary: A doujin recreation of the rail-shooter Space Harrier with Athena Asamiya from SNK's Psycho Soldier.

name: Psychic 5: Eternal
summary:
"Five heroes with super powers, five hammers saving the world."
"At that time, Satan was not completely dead."

name: Psycho Soldier
summary:
You are Athena, a school girl who goes around fighting crime, along with her
friend Kensu (Player 2), Athena sets out to bring peace to the world by killing
all monsters. This game serves somewhat as a sequel to an earlier SNK game by
the name of Athena. Following the end of that game, the goddess Athena returned
to heaven and faded from the minds of the mortals on earth below. The Athena in
this game is said to be a reincarnation of her and she has a normal job as a
pop star.Psycho Soldier is an Action game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in 1987.

name: Psychopath Massacre
summary: George Dinescu kidnapped you in his home in Romania. Get out alive while utilizing a V.H.S camera to film everything that happens inside. Torture, murder, and dismemberment take place inside the house, exposing the frightening legacy of a serial killer's decade of terror.

name: Psikyo Shooting Stars Alpha: Limited Edition
Psycholog
summary: As a psychologist, manage your clients' phobias while confronting a serial killer. This horror game blends dialogue in the style of a visual novel with first-person point-and-click elements.

name: Psikyo Shooting Stars Bravo: Limited Edition
Psychic Detective Final: Solitude Part 2
summary: The 2nd part of the final entry of the Psychic Detective series.

name: PSA World Tour Squash 2015
summary: Squash simulator for Wii.

name: Psychoballs
summary: A mind-boggling action-puzzler that requires a sharp wit and quick fingers.

name: Psycho
summary: ”Psycho” is a 3D horror game that allows you to explore and survive with your friends in the terrible mystery bunker.

name: Psy High 2: High Summer
summary: You’ve saved your high school – now save summer camp! When the ghost stories at Camp Cedarcrest turn out to be even stranger than you thought, you need to make some tough choices about how to use this powerful new magic.

name: Psychical Madness
summary: The main character - a girl named Mila. At the beginning of the game she gets into a car accident. On the street cold winter, wait for help on this she simply does not have time. Mila risks to freeze to death.

name: Pseudo-Haunting
summary: Fend off spirits by ripping your spirit off your body. Explore a glitched haunted house. Recall twisted memories. Get out alive.

name: Psycho-Pass: Mandatory Happiness - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Psycho Pass: Mandatory Happiness game,
Soundtrack CD in Jewel Case,
3 pencil boards (7" x 10"),
Microfiber cloth (6" x 6"),
Deluxe Softcover Art book (7" x 10", 72 pages),
Collectible box

name: Psychotoxic
summary:
PsychoToxic places gamers in the shoes of heroine Angie Prophet who is faced with the daunting task of saving mankind from impending Nuclear Armageddon.

The year is 2022, the place is New York City.

Angie Prophet... half human, half angel... is the only one who can defeat the Fourth Horseman of the Apocalypse, an evil character from ancient Babylon.

Throughout the game, Angie comes to an understanding of her role as civilization's savior, discovering a series of unique abilities, such as invisibility, the slowing of time and the infiltration of other's dreams all of which aid her progress.

name: Psychedelic platformer
summary: Psychedelic platformer is a minimalist platformer game which also contains in it a great challenge and a lot of fun.

name: Psoltrix
summary: Play Tetris on a regular dodecahedron or icosahedron. The latest development in falling-block technology.

name: Psi Chess
summary: A chess game written by Steven L. Watson and published by The Edge for the ZX Spectrum.

name: Psychic Eclipse
summary: A BL visual novel for PC.

name: Psikyo Shooting Library Vol. 1
summary:
Psikyo Shooting Library Vol 1 features six classic shooters beautifully rendered pixel perfect in high definition.
Unlimited Quarters: Six shooters, six stories, and an infinite supply of ammo jam-packed in one game including;

- Strikers 1945
- Strikers 1945 II
- Strikers 1999
- Sol Divide
- Dragon Blaze
- Zero Gunner 2

name: Psicose?
summary: Running away is your only option, but beware, it can also be your end. Nathanael must go through a mysterious mansion while fleeing from something that pursues him, but ends up getting involved in an occult ritual that puts him on the threshold between reality and the surreal.

name: PsyBurst
summary: Psyburst is an action side scroller, featuring 8 unique characters with many different skills. It's a hybird between sidescroller and fighting game. Play as hunters and slash your way trough your opponent.

name: PsiloSybil
summary: An old-school, tough-as nails classic linear 3D platformer with a faithful PS1 cartoony aesthetic.

name: Psionic Sentry: Infinite
summary: "Psionice Sentry: Infinite" is a third-person beautiful girl action shooting and tower defense game. A gameplay focused on combat and skill selection

name: Psi Project
summary: Psi Project is a hardcore 2D shooter with elements of horror. The main character wakes up in an unknown place. Absolutely remembers nothing. Who he is and how he got here. Throughout search of answers he is strongly plagued by different kinds of hallucinations.

name: PS! Flash
summary: Pancake Surprise! is a story that is set in the kingdom of Azaliea where you'll meet the one and only Pancake Prince.

name: Psychological Operation
summary: Experience the intense action of a Romanian Mafia Boss in this gripping action-adventure game. Fight the government, police, and elites after being stripped of all your power and wealth. Sail the seas, drive through mountains, fly in the sky, and break into top-secret labs to beat the Matrix.

name: Psychic Detective Vol. 1: Invitation
summary: The first entry in Data West's Popular adventure game series.

name: Psycologico
summary: Psycologico is a 2D isometric psychological horror.

name: Psychophonies: What Ghosts Say
summary: Do you want to escape from the ghosts? You'll have to answer all their questions correctly, only then will you be able to save yourself. Will you be able to remember all your answers?

name: Psycho-Jirai In Love
summary: A simulation of an outcast romance!

name: PsychoDive
summary: You play as Lennox, a psychic who ends up in prison for a good deed gone bad. A detective and a psychologist offer him freedom in exchange for help using his abilities. But what starts as yet another good deed quickly devolves into true psychological horror.

name: PsychoPhobia
summary:
PsychoPhobia is a new Doom2 campaign for GZDoom and Skulltag.
This total conversion features new weapons, new monsters, new textures, new music, new sounds, new decorates, new HUD, new maps, new episodes, and much more.

The modification is separated in 18 maps, with two secret levels and two episodes.

- Episode 1: "Rise of a Psycho" (8 maps) (location: Earth future)
- Episode 2: "The Dark Age" (8 maps) (location: Earth in medieval times)
- ZBloodpack
- The Pit

name: Psebay: Gravity Moto Trials
summary: Psebay is an atmospheric adventure in moto trial genre.

name: Psycho
summary: Theme: You Are The Monster

name: Psycho Slasher
summary: A psychotic slasher-villain goes on a violent killing spree!

name: PSweet
summary: Date productivity applications in a retro, hand-drawn dating simulator set in a fictional operating system that definitely doesn't have a horrible secret.

name: Psychic Force Complete
summary: Psychic Force Complete is a PlayStation 2 compilation exclusively released in Japan. This collection brings together three notable entries in the Psychic Force franchise: the original Psychic Force game, Psychic Force 2012, and an enhanced version called Psychic Force 2012 EX. The compilation offers players an improved gaming experience with refined graphics, new voice recordings, and additional bonus materials.

name: Psytron
summary: You are Psytron the brain and defense computer of Betula 5 which keeps the installation operating and defends it from attacks.

name: Psychedelia: The Psychonaut
summary: Trippy Clever Funny Relaxing Adventure For someone looking to kick back and relax and get immersed in a psychedelic world.

name: Psychiatric Hospital
summary: When your madness is not desired, When your madness that you did not want is strangled by the bars in the pit. You go from being a powerless goat to a human being, and the only way to surprise the white coats who want to cure you completely is to take refuge in the craziness you want.

name: Psebay
summary: Psebay is an atmospheric adventure in moto trial genre.

name: Psy High
summary: Interactive teen supernatural mystery! You and your friends have developed magical psychic powers. Solve the case, save your school, find a date for prom!

name: Psycho Pigs
summary: This sequel to Butasan brings the pig murdering action to the 3DS eShop.

name: PSP1G: The Incident
summary: A fan game made for PSP1G the streamer.

name: Psyvariar 2: The Will to Fabricate
summary:
Psyvariar 2: The Will to Fabricate (サイヴァリア2: THE WILL TO FABRICATE?) is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up developed by SKONEC Entertainment and distributed by Success. It is the sequel to the 2000 title, Psyvariar.

The game was initially developed for the Sega NAOMI arcade platform, and was released in Japanese arcades in November 2003. A Dreamcast version was released on February 26, 2004, and ports to both the PlayStation 2 and Xbox were released later that year.

name: Psycho
summary:
Psycho is a graphic adventure game with a key-based verb interface.

A set of jewels has been stolen. At the time of the theft, a curator was with the jewels, so he got stolen, too. And who's the suspect? Norman Bates, of course. The next night, a daring detective drives out to the sinister Bates Motel. His plan: a) find the jewels, b) free the curator and c) take a nice hot shower, should time suffice.

Psycho is entirely controlled with the keyboard: direction keys for moving your character around, shortcut keys for performing actions. You need to stand close to an interesting object in order to examine it. Adversaries will appear at random throughout the house, putting you to sleep by touch and thus draining your precious time -- you've only got four hours to solve the case. You may shoot the enemies as soon as you find a weapon. As there is no other option for character interaction, this is how you'll deal with the Bates family as well.

name: Psych Yourself
summary: Get Psych Yourself, Puzzle game for PS3 console from the official PlayStation website. Know more about Psych Yourself Game.

name: Psion Protocol
summary: Bullet-hell game. Face endless enemies in Survival Mode. Psion Themed! Earn experience and survive as long as possible! Unlock Powers and Gear. Complete achievements! Mix Psions, Powers and Gear each run! Playable with one hand. Rhythm Based.

name: Pseudo-Psy Play
summary: Pseudo-Psy Play is an eccentric blend of side-scrolling shooter and point-and-click quest. The time has come – face your fears in this bone-chilling story-driven horror adventure that feels (and looks) like nothing else in the genre. Are you ready, Joseph?

name: Psiplex
summary: An anime-styled social sci-fi SRPG game. As an inspector, navigate through the Megapolis where material production has reached its zenith, and confront the unending conflict between psychics and ordinary citizens. Only by shattering all the rules of this beautiful new world can you achieve rebirth.

name: Psychonauts 2: Motherlobe Edition
summary: Psychonauts 2: Motherlobe Edition is a physical release of the 2021 platform-adventure game developed by Double Fine Productions. It includes the full game along with a lenticular o-sleeve, a reversible poster, and a set of six art cards. The edition also features digital download codes for behind-the-scenes materials such as concept art and developer commentary. Gameplay remains unchanged, combining platforming, exploration, and psychic abilities across story-driven levels.

name: Psychedelia
summary: Dynamic interactive pattern generator.

name: Pseudoregalia: Jam Ver.
summary: When reality feels like it's falling apart, one might retreat to a world in their dreams to escape it. Unfotunately, dreams aren't made to last. Explore a perverse image of noble living. Grow strong, and free those trapped within this rotten dream.

name: PSA: Peepy Saving Adventure!
summary: This PSA was made to educate all good children on the etiquette of school life, and the dangers lurking in every place of learning. Face pedagogy, eat tasty snacks, and join Cowboy Peepy, Ungacopter, and Leglet as they venture to rescue Ema from the dark depths of School!

name: Psychocat: The Door
summary: Psychocat: The Door is a psychedelic action game that messes with your head and expands your consciousness.

name: Psycard
summary: A minesweeper like card game that is played competitively. Characters have psychic powers which give them different abilities to read cards.

name: Psycho World
summary:
A scientist and his two female assistants work on ESP research in a remote science laboratory. One day, a section of the lab blows up. It turned out that the monsters kept for experiments escaped and took one of the assistants with them. The scientist gives an "ESP booster" to the remaining assistant so she can go rescue her.

Your character possesses psychic power which she uses to blast away her enemies. You start the game with few powers and eventually gain more as items dropped by monsters are picked up. You control powers such as fire, ice, sonic waves, temporary invincibility, levitation, and more.

name: Psychoflesh
summary: Game made for Summer of Screams GameJam

name: Psycho Pinball
summary: Psycho Pinball is a 1994 pinball video game published and developed by Codemasters, released for the Sega Mega Drive in the United Kingdom, and MS-DOS personal computers in the United States and Europe.

name: Psyche Soldier VR
summary: Psyche Soldier VR is a dynamic, duck-and-dodge shooting gallery game that takes place in the psychedelic realm of your own subconscious, tackling shadow creatures that embody Agency, Attachment, Fear, Procrastination, Shame, Stress, and Perfection. What sets this game apart from other games is its unique environment/setting, the action based power up that is both offensive and defensive, the strategic and athletic game play that arises from the variety of enemy abilities, the fluid energy system, and the engaging upgrade system. There's also an infinite wave Endurance mode to see how deep into your subconscious you can go. And who knows, maybe you'll learn something about your own shadow.

name: Psyia
summary: In a black void, several hundred thousand tiny cubes dance and flow around gravitational fields emitted from the Vive controllers. Endless hypnotic and beautiful behaviours emerge from the simplest of physical laws.

name: Psyscrolr
summary: A platformer game with puzzles separating the diverse combat layouts of its levels.

name: Psyko
summary: Framed and on the run, you'll carve a bloody path through a relentless cyberpunk city to escape your pursuers. Can you fight your way free in this unforgiving roguelike?

name: Psycho Killer
summary: Psycho Killer is an adventure game with the interaction restricted to "jumping" from picture to picture, occasionally clicking on the screen in order to find objects that are possible to interact with. As in other interactive movies, some parts presented as video sequences, during which the player has to make the correct action quickly in order to succeed.

name: Psychic Storm
summary: Humanity's last hopes ride on the Stormbringer super weapons as they journey throughout the Milky Way. Can they succeed?!

name: Psychic Cat
summary: A journey across a blasted psychosphere. A cat in trouble.

name: Psychotic Nightmare
summary: Enter the dark corridors of your high school, the source of your psychotic episodes, and face your haunting fears embodied in shadows to try and find way to sanity.

name: Psychic 5
summary: A platform game that allows players to choose between five unique characters.

name: Psychopath Hunt Two
summary: A butcher has captured you and taken you to his house.

name: Psionics
summary:
After a long trip you've finally arrived at the Nexus space lab, where curious scientists were to examine your uncanny psychic potential, a talent even you couldn't comprehend. Little did you know, getting ready for a rest, that you'll be awoken by screams, lights going out, and your examiner being eaten alive by huge rabid rats!

Psionics is a simple sci-fi dungeon crawler in which the player must escape from a maze-like space station. Apart from finding a couple of items that will help you in the way, you'll be often facing mutated animals, which you may defeat not only using weapons, but also your psionic powers.

name: P.S.Rose
summary: P.S.Rose is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Baratsuki and explore several worlds outside of her bedroom with the objective of collecting effects, all of them relating to flowers or plants.

name: Psychic
summary: You are a psychic named Marilyn.The police contacted you to help find the missing girl.You are the only one who can help them.

name: Psychofunk
summary: You control the platforms, not the hero, in this groovy platformer. Go on a psychedelic adventure inspired by the trippy 60s and funky 70s. Get ready for a platforming challenge unlike anything you've ever experienced. Psychofunk is a platforming game were you push the platforms in and out like the buttons on an old cassette player. Travel through the four seasons into madness and fight intense boss fights. This game will challenge you.

name: Psycho Reign
summary: Psycho Reign is a Single or 2 player co-operative online horror puzzle and stealth game where in each level you will be chased by a blood thirsty psycho. Look for and solve mini puzzles in order to progress further on the map. Ultimately, find something to fight back...or get chopped up.

name: PSS-61
summary: A compilation cartridge compatible only with the Super Famicom Box.

name: Psychic Dectetive Final: Solitude Part 1
summary: The 1st part of the final entry of Data West's game series.

name: Psycho Dreams
summary: Psycho Dreams is a surreal psychological horror game inspired by Yume Nikki, with deep atmosphere, interesting mysteries and exciting story inspired by the best visual novel games!

name: Psybadek
summary: In Psybadek, you maneuver a hoverboard through jungle, desert, underworld and ice levels as Xako or Mia to save your friends trapped by an evil overlord. While more action oriented than racing, the game encourages you to pull off tricks and speed, all the while collecting stars and solving the odd puzzle.

name: PSN Protector
summary: As you might have heard millions of data was stolen from the PlayStation servers. Can you protect the server from further damage? Good luck!

name: Psychotic Bathtub
summary: Have a psychotic episode in your bathtub. Argue with a rubber duck, flood your bathroom and drown dad. Find your very own ending – or all of them.

name: Psycho Train
summary: An illogical dream filled with sadness and charm.

name: Psychic Detective Vol. 4: Orgel
summary: The 4th entry in the franchise and the 2nd title to be released on a console.

name: Psychic Detective Vol. 5: Nightmare
summary: The 5th entry in the Data West adventure series.

name: Psychopathics
summary: Escape the 7 psychopathics and find exit to survive in this best horror game!

name: Psi Knuckle
summary: Psi Knuckle is a sidescolling action game.

name: Pshnggg!
summary: Clash swords with friends in a teeth-rattling two stick fighter!

name: Psikyo Collection Vol. 1
summary: Arc System Works has announced Psikyo Collection Vol. 1 for Switch, which includes the currently available Nintendo eShop titles Strikers 1945 for Nintendo Switch, Sol Divide: Sword of Darkness for Nintendo Switch, Samurai Aces for Nintendo Switch, and Gunbird for Nintendo Switch. Currently, it has only been confirmed for release in Korea in 2018.

name: Psicosis
summary:
Psicosis is a 2D psychological horror game.

In Psicosis you'll accompany William to live between hallucination and reality, experiencing moments of confusion and psychological pressure with high levels of suspense.

In Psicosis you will find diverse scenarios, in which you will have to solve puzzles to advance in the game

name: Psyko
summary: PSYKO is a brutally-fast motorcycle combat game. Outrun and outgun while squeezing through traffic at breakneck speeds. Traffic is your arena, and danger is fuel. Ride the line between blistering pace and tactical precision.

name: Psikodelya: The Mansion of Madness
summary: Explore a crazy mansion to find eight energy cells. Step into increasingly crazy rooms and learn how space and time work in this crazy mansion. Solve puzzles to open new rooms and go crazy with this new free dimension for Psikodelya.

name: PSXFunkin'
summary: This is a homebrew PSone port of Friday Night Funkin'.

name: Psychic Investigation of Sakuragi Haru
summary: 3D first-person horror game set in an abandoned middle school While running away from the attacking enemies, gather information about what happened at the school and solve the mystery.

name: Psihanul
summary: PSIHANUL- you will take revenge on the bosses and colleagues for the fact that you were fired, shoot and break everything around you, do not leave anything behind you, destroy this office and no one will help you in this, so good luck and don't freak out.

name: Psychometric Personality Profiler
summary: This is a very interesting personality Test made to specifically suit you as the Perticipant. Please be honest about the answers and take your time. And by all means don't take your eyes off the screen...

name: Psychobouldering
summary: a psycho climbing game

name: PSP1G: The Incident 2
summary: A prequel to PSP1G: The Incident.

name: PS5 Simulator
summary: Wait no more, your ultimate PS5 experience is here! Poor cable management, snacks on floor and try to not break your next-game console in this non-AAA-game!

name: Psych
summary: Experience the story of Alexander Green and find out what happened on the day of the accident in this First Person horror Adventure. Follow the development of Alex, solve puzzles around the event and try not to fall into madness as you search for answers.

name: Psychic Supernatural Boyfriend
summary: You’re fresh out of the detective academy and ready for your first assignment. Thanks to your acute ability to sense the supernatural, you’re tasked with hunting down your first demon alongside a veteran detective.

name: Psy-Phi
summary: Psy-Phi is a 2005 touch-screen-based arcade fighting game developed by Digital Rex, a Sega studio led by Yu Suzuki. It was the first full-screen HD title to utilize strictly touch-screen controls. However, the game was pulled and never saw a wide release beyond location tests.

name: Psychomachia
summary: Dive into the psychological horror of Psychomachia, trapped in a terrifying loop at the heart of the madness-infested dormitories. Explore the twisted depths of the human mind, confronted by terrifying manifestations of insanity.

name: Psionic
summary: PSIONIC - is an unusual 3D shooter about psychiatric hospital with hardcore elements where you have to survive and get out of this horror.

name: Psycho Dead
summary: A third-person survival horror game that you play as a girl with psychic power who tries to escape from a secret lab and is pursued by deadly stalkers.

name: Psychic Force Puzzle Taisen
summary: Psychic Force Puzzle Taisen is a puzzle spin off of the Psychic Force series, it was only released in Japan.

name: Psychocat: The Answer
summary: "Short" Arcade Game about the life of a cat named "Zag", who desperately seeks an answer. The evil and unique gameplay is about reversing the controls on the keyboard.

name: Psy-O-Blade
summary: In 21th century, there are three main powers on the Earth. The free world and the communist block carried over from the 20th century; the third power is the New Communist Federation. Since a program of denuclearizing was supported by all those powers, the New Communist Federation developed a devastating non-nuclear weapon: the satellite "Raiden". The two other powers competed with the New Communist Federation, developing their own killer satellites, and the danger of total annihilation became once again an issue. Seeing no future for the Earth, humans started to colonize other planets. In 22th century, they sent an experimental ship "Septemius 1" to a star six light years far away from the Solar System. The ship's main computer, "Racoon", sent a strange message before stopping any communication. Keith McDonnell, a seventeen-year-old crew member of the ship "Septemius 2", was sent to investigate the strange disappearance. Psy-O-Blade is a Japanese adventure in anime style. The player interacts with the game world by moving a cursor and clicking on objects to examine or use them, and people to talk to them, or by choosing options ("Move" and "Scroll") from a menu. There are no puzzles to solve; the player advances in the game by talking to characters, visiting different locations, as well as examining and using objects.

name: Psychological Hacker 2044
summary: 「Psychological Hacker」is a turn-based combat game featuring HD-2D pixel visual style. Explore the inner worlds of others, gain their cognitive experiences and secrets, and uncover the hidden mysteries in this city.

name: Psyder
summary: psyder is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Kataochi. You can also play minigame called Sushi Survivor.

name: PS!Outertale
summary: Project Spacetime, or PS!Outertale for short, is a take on Outertale by Mimi Pippinski (2mi127). It is set on a space station (the Outpost) which the monsters were banished to after their home planet was destroyed.

name: Psycho
summary: Psycho - is an exciting 3D shooter with hardcore elements where you will explore an abandoned psychiatric hospital playing as a fighter SWAT.

name: Psi Project: Legacy
summary: Psi Project Legacy - is a new part of the hardcore 2D shooter with elements of horror. It all starts again. You have to go back to the very unfortunate complex to endure the horror.

name: Psyvariar: Medium Unit
summary: Psyvariar is a vertical scrolling shooter released in arcades in 2000 by Success. The game contains a variety of stages and it features a 'buzz' gameplay style, making it possible to earn levels by dodging enemy bullets.

name: Psychic Guardian Super Splendor
summary: After being captured by a mysterious group, university student Nagisa Kujo hears a voice in her head telling her she needs to escape. She also discovers that when she presses a button on her belt, she becomes clad in combat gear. With her newfound power, Nagisa fights to stop evil.

name: Psychic Isolation
summary: Psychic Isolation is an episodic narrative horror game revolving around the horrible fates of the ones that are now trying to kill you.

name: Pseudoregalia
summary: Sybil finds herself in a distorted castle and must find her own way out. Grow strong and unlock new abilities to build up a deep movement system, fight enemies, find secrets, and uncover the mysteries of Castle Sansa.

name: PsyHotel
summary: Take on the role of the owner of a cosy hotel off the beaten path of civilization. Just remember that all your clients are criminals and psychopaths. Take care of them properly, starting with thieves and ending with fat fishes. You are the law here!

name: Psychosis
summary: This is a side-scrolling shooter played in a world created from the mind of a twisted demon. Your soul has suddenly wandered into that evil world that exists in every person's heart. The only way out is to blast your way past the grotesque creatures that block your path in five "causes" (stages). You must face the dangers of this psychedelic world by making full use of three shot types and the satellite option. With power-ups, you can change your shots to a wide-coverage beam, a satellite-generated laser and more. Each shot type can be powered up to three levels. You can also block enemy fire by rotating the satellites to a desired position. How you use these features will be the key to successfully escaping this strange and surreal world

name: PSI
summary: Civilization has never evolved past steam energy. A series of poorly maintained steam turbines keep society from collapse. An unexpected pressure buildup in the Turbine Core sends you on a adventure through the poorly maintained infrastructure.
